name: Temple Robot
description:
Game name: Temple Robot with new features AIDS EDITION!

Controls: wasd to move left click to shoot spacebar to jump. There is a moving brick, you can basically surf on it to the other side.

Description:  this is an adventure shooter game, where you shoot robots with a gun, if you get hit you get aids and die. You are supposed to travel from left to right, and doors take you to the next stage. Some enemies have higher amounts of hp, and you can get stuck on walls.
